translations: 岩石的；岩石般的；坚硬的

sentences.sentence: Giant dermoid cyst of the petrous apex.
The symbolism of the primordial petrous picture was almost the nature made.
sentences.translation: 原始岩画的象征性几乎是天籁所成。

sentences.sentence: Objective : To explore the clinic characteristic petrous bone cholesteatoma.
sentences.translation: 目的： 探讨岩部胆脂瘤的临床特征及手术方法。
